user_instruction: 'Compose an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee with the latest updates. You can check out my Alumni Tracker on Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Alumni Updates from Notion Tracker

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! As we prepare our next email for the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee, could you please share the most recent updates on our classmates—contact details, RSVP status, and any other notes—from your Alumni Tracker on Notion?  

If it’s easier, you can simply grant us view access to the Tracker or export the latest data and send it over. We’re aiming to finalize the email by [insert deadline], so receiving the information by then would be a huge help.

Thank you very much for your continued support!

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee

final_output:
Subject: Request for Latest Alumni Updates from Notion Tracker

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! As we prepare our next email for the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee, could you please share the most recent updates on our classmates—contact details, RSVP status, and any other notes—from your Alumni Tracker on Notion?  

If it’s easier, you can simply grant us view access to the Tracker or export the latest data and send it over. We’re aiming to finalize the email by [insert deadline], so receiving the information by then would be a huge help.

Thank you very much for your continued support!

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee
